00024   Real resid;
00025   Vector z;
00026 
00027   Real normb = norm(b);
00028   Vector r = b - A*x;
00029 
00030   if (normb == 0.0) 
00031     normb = 1;
00032   
00033   if ((resid = norm(r) / normb) <= tol) {
00034     tol = resid;
00035     max_iter = 0;
00036     return 0;
00037   }
00038   
00039   for (int i = 1; i <= max_iter; i++) {
00040     z = M.solve(r);
00041     x += z;
00042     r = b - A * x;
00043     
00044     if ((resid = norm(r) / normb) <= tol) {
00045       tol = resid;
00046       max_iter = i;
00047       return 0;
00048     }
00049   }
00050 
00051   tol = resid;
00052   return 1;
